overview: The Sinterklaasjournaal is the annual fictional news section in the context of the traditional Sinterklaas celebration of the NTR on Dutch television, showing what Sinterklaas experience everything. The format of the 'real' television news is imitated, where storylines are presented in fragments as reports.
tagline: Nothing is what it seems in Sinterklaas time
title: Sinterklaasjournaal 2022
